words.source: H7993 wayyiqtol 3mp Hiphil of שָׁלַךְ 'to throw, cast'; KJV 'they cast down', ESV 'they each cast down', NASB 'each one threw down'
H376 n.ms אִישׁ 'man, each'; KJV 'every man', ESV 'each', NASB 'each one'
H4294 n.ms constr. + 3ms suff. מַטֶּה 'staff, rod'; KJV 'his rod', ESV 'his staff', NASB 'his staff'
H1961 wayyiqtol 3mp Qal of הָיָה 'to be, become'; KJV 'and they became', ESV 'and they became', NASB 'and they became'
H8577 prep. l- + n.mp תַּנִּין 'serpent, dragon'; KJV 'serpents', ESV 'serpents', NASB 'serpents'
H1104 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of בָּלַע 'to swallow'; KJV 'swallowed up', ESV 'swallowed up', NASB 'swallowed up'
H4294 n.ms constr. מַטֶּה 'staff, rod'; KJV 'rod', ESV 'staff', NASB 'staff'
H175 proper name; all trans. agree
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
